title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 140 - Credit To Nonresident Beneficiary Of Trust Receiving Accumulation Distribution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 140 - Credit To Nonresident Beneficiary Of Trust Receiving Accumulation Distribution

State Regulations
§ 140.1 - Credit to nonresident beneficiary of trust receiving accumulation distribution
§ 140.2 - Limitation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 140

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 697

This Part does not reflect amendments to the Tax Law made
by the Tax Reform and Reduction Act of 1987 (Chapter 28 of the Laws of 1987)
and certain other amendments. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
